title: Save a Failed Idol’s Life - Novel Updates
tags: Celebrities   Game Elements   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Showbiz   Transmigration
author: 메로나르
description:
[Will you accept the special quest “Idol - Cheon Yise”?]
Lim Hyunsung, 'Master of Taste”, who pioneered the myth of the restaurant industry. After being killed in some kind of incident, he possesses an idol according to the guidance of an unidentified system.
'This guy… he’s been a failed idol for 5 years?'
Will he be able to save this failed idol with his own hands?>
